__e: But, Lieutenant, with only that much gas, it will be impossible to-- You heard me.
I hope there is some near gas station We need gasoline
How could we possibly get away from here? We've got a sick child, two women, one woman out of her head, three men, and the place is surrounded with these things. For NASA.
There's a van on the lot, gassed and ready to go.
I'm sorry to bother you... But I ran out of gas and you're the only light.
We've got enough petrol to get to France, haven't we?
And I can get myself another filling station to store the stuff.
I'm sorry, we've only got enough fuel to get to base.
- Listen, there isn't much gas in the car.
In the motorcycle, we got enough gas to carry it half a mile.
We won't get there - not enough fuel in tank!
